alert.note: Alert for Deuel; Grant (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 1:49AM MST until March 06 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches with highest amounts along the Coteau. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Big Stone County. In South Dakota, Grant and Deuel Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Minnesota, the latest road conditions can be obtained at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1. In South Dakota, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
